app_title: Steam Achievement Localizer by Pan_Vena ver
warning_message:
Possible bugs, for questions please refer to the GitHub page, or write in private on Telegram: @Pan_Vena or Discord: pan_vena
Other my contact details can be found in 'About App'
steam_folder_label: Select path to Steam folder (For example: C:\Program Files (x86)\Steam)
game_id_label: Enter game ID or Steam store link (For example: https://store.steampowered.com/app/257510/The_Talos_Principle/)
indirect_file_sel_label: Indirect file selection by ID (Windows only(?))
save_bin_unknown: Save bin file to Steam folder
save_changes_msg: Do you want to save your changes before exiting?
save_where_msg: Where do you want to save your changes?
about_message:
The app is made for translating Steam achievements names.
In case of questions:
- Telegram: @Pan_Vena
- Discord: pan_vena
- GitHub: PanVena
Also thanks for pull requests: Nick Defrunct and veydzh3r
error_no_id:
Enter game ID or link to it,
 which you know from the top of the Steam store page
export_csv_for_translate_info:
Export to CSV for translation includes columns: key, english, ukrainian and selected context language.
You can select the context language in the "Language selection" field
After translation, fill in the 'ukrainian' column and import the file back into the program and select 'english' as the context language.

Selected context language: {context}
import_csv_info:
Importing CSV will replace the selected language with values from the 'ukrainian' column if it is filled in.
Make sure the file has the columns: 'key', 'ukrainian'.
Select the context language in the "Language selection" field before importing.

Selected language for replacement: {context}
error_no_end_was_found: Cannot find the end of the line.
error_nothing_after_english: Could not find end of string after 'english'.
error_manually_selected_file: You have loaded the file from some other folder, go save it somewhere else
folder_not_found_auto: Could not find Steam folder automatically
